channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: PayPal CEO Alex Chriss says stablecoins will be key as his company navigates the ‘classic innovator’s dilemma’
item.description: The nearly-three-decade-old firm is incorporating dollar-backed tokens across its business verticals, say PayPal executives.

item.title: Baby Boomers Are Aging Into A Primary Care Shortage. America Isn’t Ready For This
item.description: The largest influx of new beneficiaries is aging into Medicare amid a worsening clinician shortage. Here are four ways the industry can head off this ...

item.title: State Department announces massive $10 billion arms sale to Taiwan, infuriating China
item.description: China said it would violate diplomatic agreements, gravely harm China's sovereignty, security and territorial integrity, and undermine regional stabil...

item.title: Inflation remained elevated in November as Fed considers pausing interest rate cuts
item.description: The Bureau of Labor Statistics released the November consumer price index which showed that CPI inflation remained well above the Federal Reserve's 2%...

item.title: A Secret ‘Starfield’ Event Has Fans Expecting A 2.0 Update
item.description: Starfield is continuing development with a new expansion in 2026, plus what appears to be a major update coming besides that.

item.title: An Update On ‘Pluribus’ Seasons 2 Through 10 On Apple TV
item.description: We know that Pluribus is getting a season 2 on Apple TV, but now we have an update on how long its star want it to run.

item.title: Netflix’s Best New Overlooked Show Has A 100% Rotten Tomatoes Score
item.description: Netflix's best new show has a 100% Rotten Tomatoes score from critics, but almost no one is watching it. Check it out.

item.title: Top AI defense CEO warns China could ‘bleed American stockpiles dry’ in the event of a conflict, claiming U.S. munitions could run out in a week
item.description: U.S. weapons systems are also likely difficult to mobilize in case of a conflict.

item.title: Quordle Hints And Answers For Friday, December 19
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: 25 years after a Harvard professor told America it was ‘bowling alone,’ the loneliness epidemic is starker than ever
item.description: In 2023, then Surgeon General Vivek Murthy reported on an “epidemic of loneliness and isolation,” similar to previous advisories on smoking and obesit...

item.title: ‘They took all of our oil not that long ago. And we want it back’: Trump demands Venezuela return seized assets
item.description: U.S. oil companies dominated Venezuela's petroleum industry until the the 1970s and then under Nicolás Maduro and his predecessor, Hugo Chávez.

item.title: Micron just had its Nvidia moment. What comes next for the stock?
Marijuana stocks jump as Trump set to sign executive order
Why Trump Media is getting into the nuclear business with a $6 billion deal
CPI report: Inflation slowed to 2.7% rate in November
Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq open higher after soft inflation reading
FDA announces recall of frozen dessert pints over possible 'small stones'
item.description: The FDA announced a voluntary recall of non-dairy frozen dessert pints sold at stores nationwide over the potential presence of small stones.

item.title: Musk predicts AI will create 'universal high income' and make saving money unnecessary
item.description: Elon Musk dismisses Trump savings accounts, claiming AI will create "universal high income" and eliminate poverty, making saving unnecessary.

item.title: PayPal plans to launch bank serving small businesses around the US
item.description: PayPal files with Utah and the FDIC to launch PayPal Bank, an industrial loan company offering small business lending and FDIC-insured savings account...

item.title: iRobot co-founder says FTC's opposition to Amazon deal was 'wrong-minded' following bankruptcy filing
item.description: iRobot filed for bankruptcy and will be bought by Chinese manufacturer after Amazon's $1.4 billion acquisition was blocked by the FTC on antitrust gro...

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
